com.greef.ui.calendar
Class CalendarTableModel

java.lang.Object
  com.greef.ui.calendar.CalendarTableModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.swing.table.TableModel
public class CalendarTableModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.table.TableModel

A table model that returns Integer's for every cell, every integer representing the day in month displayed as a grid (the weekdays as columns and weeks as rows).

Author:
Adrian BER

getWeekDayColumnNameType

public int getWeekDayColumnNameType()
Returns how the column names will be displayed. The possible values are
ONE
only the first character of the week day will be displayed
SHORT
the short name of the week day will be displayed
LONG
the entire name of the week day will be displayed

setWeekDayColumnNameType

public void setWeekDayColumnNameType(int weekDayColumnNameType)
Sets how the column names will be displayed. The possible values are
ONE
only the first character of the week day will be displayed
SHORT
the short name of the week day will be displayed
LONG
the entire name of the week day will be displayed

Parameters:
weekDayColumnNameType - the display type
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given display type is not one of the three values
